26#ifndef NetworkCacheBlobStorage_h
27#define NetworkCacheBlobStorage_h
28
29#include "NetworkCacheData.h"
30#include "NetworkCacheKey.h"
31#include <wtf/SHA1.h>
32
33namespace WebKit {
34namespace NetworkCache {
35
36// BlobStorage deduplicates the data using SHA1 hash computed over the blob bytes.
37class BlobStorage {
38 WTF_MAKE_NONCOPYABLE(BlobStorage);
39public:
40 BlobStorage(const String& blobDirectoryPath, Salt);
41
42 struct Blob {
43 Data data;
44 SHA1::Digest hash;
45 };
46 // These are all synchronous and should not be used from the main thread.
47 Blob add(const String& path, const Data&);
48 Blob get(const String& path);
49
50 // Blob won't be removed until synchronization.
51 void remove(const String& path);
52
53 unsigned shareCount(const String& path);
54
55 size_t approximateSize() const { return m_approximateSize; }
56
57 void synchronize();
58
59private:
60 String blobDirectoryPathIsolatedCopy() const;
61 String blobPathForHash(const SHA1::Digest&) const;
62
63 const String m_blobDirectoryPath;
64 const Salt m_salt;
65
66 std::atomic<size_t> m_approximateSize { 0 };
67};
68
69}
70}
71
72#endif
73
